title: Temporary transit camp erected, under this Regulation shall have to be demolished by the Developer within 30 days from grant of Occupation Certificate to the Rehabilitation buildings and the land there under shall be brought back to the original state
clause_text: Temporary transit camp erected, under this Regulation shall have to be demolished by the Developer within 30 days from grant of Occupation Certificate to the Rehabilitation buildings and the land there under shall be brought back to the original state.
